entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow declaring DiagnosticAnalyzerAttributes on abstract classes without causing initialization errors #56340
  • Introduce parameter for '..' on XML Literal throws Exception. #56337
  • Wrong Comment token inserted, should xml variant. #56336

Closed

  • @AdamSpeight2008 It looks like there are some formatting errors. #56334

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixes menu item "Initialize Interactive with Project" missing for .Net Core projects #56339
    Area-Interactive
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements

Merged

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56335
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #56328
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Refactor code to simpler implementation using `_pool.ToListAndFree(..)` #56277
    Area-Compilers
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE
  • Factor process telemetry service out of RemoteHostService #56329
    Area-IDE
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
